description: Yaeno Nadeshiko is Sumomo`s closest friend. While innocently out for a walk, she discovers Sumomo`s job as a Stellar Spinner. According to the rules of the collection game, as explained by Natsume, anyone who discovers the identity of a Stellar Spinner (other than her partner) must have their memory erased. Unable to accept this, Sumomo insists on finding another way.
name: Yaeno Nadeshiko
